decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful adventure spells. By utilizing the adventure mechanic and cards like Lucky Clover and Edgewall Innkeeper, the deck can generate card advantage and tempo, while also ramping with Beanstalk Giant and Nissa, Who Shakes the World. The inclusion of Fae of Wishes allows for versatile sideboard options and Escape to the Wilds provides additional card advantage. Overall, this deck aims to apply consistent pressure and out-value opponents through efficient plays and versatile threats.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through powerful spells and removal while utilizing the Fires of Invention enchantment to cast multiple spells for free each turn. It aims to control the board with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Shatter the Sky, and generate value with cards like Shark Typhoon and Agent of Treachery. Yorion, Sky Nomad acts as a companion to provide additional value by blinking permanents. The deck also includes card draw and scrying effects to maintain card advantage and consistency.

This deck focuses on maximizing damage output by playing aggressive creatures and utilizing sacrifice effects. By pairing the companion Obosh with odd-costed cards, this deck aims to deal even more damage with each attack. The core strategy involves sacrificing creatures like Cauldron Familiar and generating value with Mayhem Devil triggers. Witch's Oven and Claim the Firstborn are used to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and strategic sacrifices.

This deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with creatures and utilizing Winota, Joiner of Forces to trigger powerful enter-the-battlefield effects and create a lethal army. By playing aggressive threats like Legion Warboss and Haktos the Unscarred, along with value creatures like Brazen Borrower and Bonecrusher Giant, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a fast victory. With a mix of early game aggression and disruptive elements like Agent of Treachery, the deck can quickly take control of the game and put pressure on the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to steadily cycle through your cards to quickly build up a board of creatures while also utilizing cycle payoffs like Zenith Flare. Lurrus of the Dream-Den serves as an additional resource to bring back key pieces from the graveyard. With a mix of creatures, removal and combat tricks, this deck aims to apply consistent pressure on the opponent and finish them off with a big Zenith Flare. The aggressive nature combined with cycling allows for a fast and efficient gameplay strategy.

The deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with cards like Shatter the Sky and Elspeth Conquers Death. Lukka, Coppercoat Outcast and Agent of Treachery provide versatile creature stealing options, and Yorion, Sky Nomad acts as a companion for additional value. The deck also includes a variety of card draw and manipulation tools like Narset, Parter of Veils and Omen of the Sea to ensure consistency in drawing into key pieces. The overall strategy revolves around controlling the game through efficient resource management and powerful threats.

The concept revolves around using Fires of Invention to efficiently play powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Shatter the Sky. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a companion to provide additional value with blink effects. The deck focuses on card advantage with Narset, Parter of Veils and tempo swings with Agent of Treachery. The goal is to establish a dominating board presence with a variety of threats and disruption tools, ultimately outvaluing and outlasting the opponent in a grindy game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly cycle through cards to build up your graveyard for Zenith Flare, while also utilizing creatures with cycling abilities to maintain card advantage and chip away at your opponent's life total. Lurrus of the Dream-Den serves as a companion to provide additional value for recurring low-cost permanents. With a mix of cycling cards and aggressive creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with a steady stream of damage and efficient plays.

The main idea behind this deck is to aggressively cycle through cards to build up a board presence and then finish off the opponent with powerful cycling cards like Zenith Flare. The deck revolves around quickly cycling through cards to trigger abilities and take advantage of cards with cycling to deal damage and gain advantage. It also utilizes the companion Lurrus of the Dream-Den to provide additional value from the graveyard. The goal is to outpace the opponent and overwhelm them before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on controlling the board with cards like Agent of Treachery, Fires of Invention, and Teferi, Time Raveler, while utilizing powerful enchantments like Elspeth Conquers Death and Shark Typhoon to maintain board advantage. The goal is to outvalue your opponent by generating card advantage with Narset, Parter of Veils and Yorion, Sky Nomad, while also having the flexibility to deal with threats using cards like Deafening Clarion and Shatter the Sky. The deck aims to slow down the game and win through incremental advantage.

The deck focuses on controlling the game with powerful planeswalkers and removal spells, while using Fires of Invention to cast spells for free. The key strategy involves ramping up mana with lands and various ramp spells, then using Fires of Invention to cast multiple spells each turn. The deck also utilizes Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to provide additional value by blinking creatures and permanents for extra triggers. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outcontrol the opponent until achieving victory.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of cheap, evasive threats and counterspells to control the board. The deck aims to maintain tempo through cards like Sea-Dasher Octopus and Brineborn Cutthroat while disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Neutralize and Mystical Dispute. By using efficient creatures like Pteramander and Stonecoil Serpent, the deck looks to close out the game quickly while utilizing Gadwick, the Wizened for card advantage. The land base is designed to support the deck's tempo and control strategy.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful enter-the-battlefield effects triggered by Winota, Joiner of Forces. By constantly putting pressure on the opponent and generating additional value through Winota's ability, the deck seeks to quickly establish a dominant board presence and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. The deck also includes a mix of removal, card advantage, and versatile threats to provide flexibility and resilience in various matchups.

This deck aims to quickly establish a board presence while utilizing Winota, Joiner of Forces to cheat out powerful non-human creatures and overwhelm the opponent. The deck contains a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the battlefield and generate value through Winota's ability. By combining efficient creatures like Legion Warboss and Robber of the Rich with powerful finishers like Agent of Treachery, the deck can quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.
